DOC.brief_summary: The purpose meal study investigate acute effect satiety inflammation advance glycation endproducts ( AGE ) healthy overweight subject . The AGE content meal affect food preparation method : frying/grilling versus boiling/steaming .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Advanced Glycation Endproducts Satiety Inflammation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male females 20 50 year old BMI 2540 Waist circumference 88 cm woman 102 cm men Exercise training 8 hour/week Smoking Pregnant breastfeed woman Postmenstrual woman Regular use medicine ( except contraceptive pill ) Previous gastric bypass surgery Donation blood within last 3 month Involvement clinical trial Allergic paraaminobenzoic acid
